closed note 3576591 (near 1137, Central Hungary, 1137, Hungary) / * 2023 February 27 07:33 ha5vsa Created: Unable to answer "Is this still here?" for https://osm.org/node/5646042048 via StreetComplete 51.0: / Óra akkor is, ha a forgó kocka egyik oldalán sincs számlap? / * 2023 February 27 12:47 bkil Updated: Amennyiben az idő múlásával arányban olyan folyamatos és ismétlődő változás figyelhető meg az objektum kapcsán melyből a helyi pontos időre enged következtetni az megalapozza az óra funkciónak való megfelelést. A részleteket a vonatkozó alkulcsokban illetve a description és description:en alatt lehet feltüntetni. https://wiki.osm.org/Tag:amenity%3Dclock / * 2024 January 14 14:26 infeeeee Resolved: Pénteken láttam, hogy két oldalán is a pontos időt jelezte az óra, mutatók segítségével. A jelenlegi címkék megfelelnek a valóságnak
new note 4067935 (near 6800, South Great Plain, 6800, Hungary) / * 2024 January 14 14:23 gabro00 Created: Területrendezési tervben Pepere néven szerepel. Szóval Papere vagy Pepere?

closed note 621965 (near 7773, Southern Transdanubia, 7773, Hungary) / * 2016 July 9 18:18 Bence Kontar Created: The place has gone or never existed. This is an auto-generated note from MAPS.ME application: a user reports a POI that is visible on a map (which can be outdated), but cannot be found on the ground. User comments: "the 5th and 7th is one single house " (OSM data version: 2016-06-20T05:57:02Z) #mapsme / * 2024 January 14 12:57 NightH Resolved:

closed note 531118 (near Síkvölgypuszta, Tatabánya) / * 2016 March 21 15:34 Kolesár Created: Oneway streets need to be revised here. I have seen a sign at the end of Szelim utca to be oneway to southeast (reverse to current tagging) but I don't know if it was applied to whole street or only a part so I have left untouched. I was not able to check all streets. / * 2024 January 14 12:57 NightH Resolved: It was reversed in the past. As of today, the tagging is correct.

closed note 184946 (near Újmajor, Ács) / * 2014 June 16 14:49 KoMa! Created: The road from the crossing on the right to the river "conco-patak" legally does not exist, the land is private territory ("048/11"), no easement. From the river to the west the road is called "082/11" and does exist. / * 2024 January 14 12:50 NightH Resolved: After the construction of the new Eurovelo route the note has lost it's meaning.

closed note 2278972 (near 8879, Western Transdanubia, 8879, Hungary) / * 2020 July 25 21:45 tomasss Created: I think 7538 and 7539 should be tertiary road. I went there last week (2020-07) and it was really horrible. My navigation navigate me there, because 7549 and 7539 have the same priority as 7538. Highway 7538 is much better. But I don't know if it's correct to change this only on my mind. / I leave it like that for someone more experienced for this territory. / * 2020 July 25 21:50 tomasss Updated: * my fault, correction: I think 7549 and 7539 should be tertiary road. / * 2024 January 14 10:22 infeeeee Resolved: According to wiki Hungarian 4 digit roads should be tagged as secondary: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Highway:International_equivalence / The quality of the surface is a different metric, and there are other tags for that: / https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:smoothness / https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:tracktype

new comment 3976789 (near 1224, Central Hungary, 1224, Hungary) / * 2023 November 7 12:23 bkil Created: Kapcsolót itt nem akartuk jelölni? / * 2023 November 19 09:14 BáthoryPéter Updated: kell ehhez valami terepen? talán megyek erre ma / * 2023 November 19 12:34 bkil Updated: Le lehetne fotózni a kábeleket, az oszlopot és esetleg ha van valami számtábla ami nincs lefotózva. Nem értettük a terepen, hogy miért van elosztó egyenes szakaszon vagy nem tudom miért nem lett felrajzolva. @vasony / * 2024 January 13 18:22 tregec Updated: A kérdést nem értem, de ezek a fotók talán segítenek. / https://kepkuldes.com/image/PDhvNP / https://kepkuldes.com/image/PDhdr2 / https://kepkuldes.com/image/PDhpSH
